text.twitchchat.title: Twitch Chat Bridge
text.twitchchat.default.prefix.tooltip: Put this at the start of your messages to send them to a Twitch channel
text.twitchchat.default.dateFormat.toolt: Customize the timestamp format messages are going to follow
text.twitchchat.command.base.noargs1: Welcome to the Minecraft-Twitch Bridge mod!
text.twitchchat.command.base.noargs2: To enable it just do /twitch enable when you're done setting up the config.
text.twitchchat.command.enable.set_confi: Before doing that you have to set your config!
text.twitchchat.command.enable.select_ch: You won't connect to a channel because you haven't selected any. You can select a channel with /twitch watch [channel]
text.twitchchat.watch.connect_on_enable: The mod will connect to '%s' as soon as you enable it.
text.twitchchat.chat.integration_disable: Twitch integration is not enabled, to enable it do /twitch enable.
text.twitchchat.bot.kicked: Kicked from the current channel because: '%s'
